section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Sonae is a multinational company managing a diversified portfolio of businesses in retail, financial services, technology, shopping centres and telecommunications.
relevant_communication: Our activities aim to establish a constructive dialogue with institutions and stakeholders contributing to the EU policy-making. This includes  contacting MEPs and staff of  EU institutions, developing and presenting position papers, and organising events to which MEPs and staff of  EU institutions are invited.
